   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to CMVDET's documentation!
=================================
CMVDET is a Python repository for Cytomegalovirus detection in whole-slide images.

To install the latest release, run::

    git clone https://github.com/Karnsira/CMVDET.git

See our :ref:`Detection page <installation>` for details.

To check the version of CMVDET, run::

    CMVDET -v

To detect CMV, you can follow the instructions in our :ref:`Quickstart page <quickstart>`. 

Contents
------------------
.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   
   installation
   quickstart
   detection
   classification
   ensemble
   visualization
   help

Contacts
--------
If you use CMVDET in your research, please cite

Tungmay T. Phinthuphan and Karn K. Siriwichai, et al., Cytomegalovirus Detection in Whole-Slide Images.

CMVDET is maintained by `Tungmay T. Phinthuphan <https://github.com/tungmaytaymung>`_ and `Karn K. Siriwichai <https://github.com/Karnsira>`_ from Chulalongkorn University.

If you want to contribute, please leave an issue in `our repo <https://github.com/Karnsira/CMVDET>`_

Thank you!
